filming_locations: Chaplin Studios - 1416 N. La Brea Avenue, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot: A tramp falls in love with a beautiful blind girl. Her family is in financial trouble. The tramp's on-and-off friendship with a wealthy man allows him to be the girl's benefactor and suitor.
title: City Lights
plot_simple: The Tramp struggles to help a blind flower girl he has fallen in love with.
also_known_as: City Lights: A Comedy Romance in Pantomime
